pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Select and align nested models

content.raw:
That would be really nice, but I think it's out of the scope of this PR. We can ticket an issue. 

A broader issue to be discussed is how deeply we want to edit nested models. Ideally, we would be able to go into a model, edit some links, then come back to the top model, maybe "ungroup" a nested model, and so on.
content.html:
That would be really nice, but I think it's out of the scope of this PR. We can ticket an issue.

A broader issue to be discussed is how deeply we want to edit nested models. Ideally, we would be able to go into a model, edit some links, then come back to the top model, maybe "ungroup" a nested model, and so on.
